UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antifungal activity of synthetic peptides derived from Impatiens balsamina antimicrobial peptides Ib-AMP1 and Ib-AMP4.
Literature.Author: Thevissen K, François IE, Sijtsma L, van Amerongen A, Schaaper WM, Meloen R, Posthuma-Trumpie T, Broekaert WF, Cammue BP
